author: potuz
content: I would like to have a way for validators to become builders. This has an unintended consequence that this becomes a consolidation anyway

author: greystroke
content: Looking at it, other than some small solo stakers,  the consolidation pathway is not being utilized much at all. We are mostly seeing large stakers withdraw 0x01 and then restake as 0x02. If we want to speed this up, we should increase the maximum churn rate in Glamsterdam. At least for the withdrawal queue, which would both speed up one leg of these large scale consolidations and also decrease the LST depeg arb which creates a feedback loop further increasing the withdrawal queue.
